summary: سنوبي هو كلب لطيف من سلسلة الفكاهة المصورة 'بينوتس'، يعيش مغامرات يومية مع صديقه تشارلي براون وأصدقائه الآخرين. يتميز سنوبي بخياله الواسع وشخصيته المرحة التي تجعله محبوبًا لدى الجميع.
tag_reason: نطق بطيء، جمل قصيرة، محتوى بسيط مناسب للمبتدئين جدًا

title: Peppa Pig
summary: بيبا بيغ هو مسلسل رسوم متحركة بريطاني يحكي عن مغامرات خنزيرة صغيرة تدعى بيبا مع عائلتها وأصدقائها. يعرض المسلسل مواقف يومية بطريقة مرحة وتعليمية تناسب الأطفال الصغار.
tag_reason: نطق بطيء، جمل قصيرة، محتوى بسيط مناسب للمبتدئين جدًا

title: Wonder Girl
srt_content:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:02,000
📢 تابعنا على قناة English Convs لتعلم الإنجليزية!

2
00:00:01,314 --> 00:00:03,463
المتحدث 0: Wait. One quick thing left do. I'll be right back.

3
00:00:07,205 --> 00:00:17,259
المتحدث 0: Hi, everyone. It's me we're girl. Sorry for the abrupt message, but I'm taking some recreation time for the next couple of hours, so Just in case any of you villains were thinking of committing a crime.

4
00:00:25,402 --> 00:00:29,489
المتحدث 0: So again, we're thinking about committing a crime in the next couple of hours. Don't.

5
00:00:31,568 --> 00:00:32,447
المتحدث 0: Thank you for your time.

6
00:00:33,806 --> 00:00:38,382
المتحدث 0: We now return to citizens of a sparkly planet already in progress.
summary: واندر جيرل هي بطلة خارقة شابة تمتلك قوى عظيمة وتكافح من أجل العدالة. تعرض القصص تحدياتها في موازنة حياتها اليومية مع مسؤولياتها كبطلة، مما يجعلها نموذجًا إيجابيًا للشجاعة والتصميم.
tag_reason: السرعة متوسطة، جمل واضحة، محتوى يومي سهل الفهم مع بعض المفردات الجديدة

title: Raya & the Last Dragon
srt_content:
138
00:11:14,633 --> 00:11:16,426
Things look a little tense, Ba.

139
00:11:16,593 --> 00:11:18,679
Don't worry, I'm gonna open with a joke.

140
00:11:18,846 --> 00:11:19,972
Please don't.

141
00:11:20,138 --> 00:11:21,431
I'm kidding, I'm kidding.

142
00:11:22,975 --> 00:11:25,185
People of Tail, Talon,

143
00:11:25,269 --> 00:11:27,729
Spine, and Fang,

144
00:11:27,896 --> 00:11:29,773
welcome to Heart.

145
00:11:30,774 --> 00:11:33,318
For far too long, we have been enemies,

146
00:11:33,402 --> 00:11:35,696
but today is a new day.

147
00:11:36,154 --> 00:11:39,741
Today, we can be Kumandra once more.

148
00:11:41,368 --> 00:11:43,745
Nice speech, Chief Benja.

149
00:11:43,912 --> 00:11:45,539
But why'd you really bring us here?

150
00:11:45,622 --> 00:11:46,623
Are you gonna rob us?

151
00:11:46,832 --> 00:11:48,292
Why would he need to rob us?

152
00:11:48,375 --> 00:11:50,627
The land of Heart already has everything.

153
00:11:50,794 --> 00:11:53,130
Oh, it's easy to pontificate on Kumandra

154
00:11:53,297 --> 00:11:55,174
when you hold the mightiest weapon in all the lands.

155
00:11:56,341 --> 00:11:59,344
The gem's not a weapon. It's a sacred relic.

156
00:11:59,511 --> 00:12:02,181
Kumandra! Kumandra's a joke!

157
00:12:02,639 --> 00:12:03,932
He brought us all this way

158
00:12:04,016 --> 00:12:05,767
to talk about fairy tales.

159
00:12:05,934 --> 00:12:07,269
This is pointless!

160
00:12:15,152 --> 00:12:16,612
I have something to say.

161
00:12:21,491 --> 00:12:22,618
Who's hungry?
summary: رايا والتنين الأخير هو فيلم مغامرات عن فتاة شجاعة تدعى رايا تبحث عن التنين الأخير لإنقاذ مملكتها من قوى الشر. الفيلم يعلم قيم الثقة والتعاون في عالم خيالي رائع.

title: Arthur
srt_content:
191
00:08:09,800 --> 00:08:11,400
Still awake, sweetie?

192
00:08:11,400 --> 00:08:13,566
Of course I'm still awake.

193
00:08:13,566 --> 00:08:16,033
When I was Binky I slept well.

194
00:08:16,033 --> 00:08:17,700
Now? Forget it.

195
00:08:17,700 --> 00:08:18,933
Here's a sandwich.

196
00:08:18,933 --> 00:08:20,500
I thought you
might be hungry.

197
00:08:20,500 --> 00:08:24,033
And I also thought
you should see this.

198
00:08:24,033 --> 00:08:25,400
Who's that?

199
00:08:25,400 --> 00:08:26,066
Shelley Barnes.

200
00:08:26,066 --> 00:08:29,333
Your great-grandfather,
the person you were named after.

201
00:08:29,333 --> 00:08:32,400
Was he in the circus?

202
00:08:32,400 --> 00:08:33,400
Let me guess.

203
00:08:33,400 --> 00:08:34,866
He was a sideshow attraction

204
00:08:34,866 --> 00:08:37,633
because he had
such a dorky name.

205
00:08:37,633 --> 00:08:40,332
No, he owned the circus.

206
00:08:40,332 --> 00:08:43,032
At least he did eventually.

207
00:08:43,033 --> 00:08:45,300
At first, he was just
part of a circus,

208
00:08:45,300 --> 00:08:47,100
and not a very good one
at that.

209
00:08:47,100 --> 00:08:50,600
They were known as "The
Traveling Malenky Brothers"

210
00:08:50,600 --> 00:08:53,666
and even their barker was bad.

211
00:08:53,666 --> 00:08:54,800
(yawns)

212
00:08:54,800 --> 00:08:55,766
Step right up.

213
00:08:55,766 --> 00:08:57,200
Come see a pretty good show.

214
00:08:57,200 --> 00:09:01,133
MRS. BARNES:
When Shelley was only
nine years old,

215
00:09:01,133 --> 00:09:02,666
he joined the trapeze act,

216
00:09:02,666 --> 00:09:05,200
helping Ferdinand
the Flying Fox,

217
00:09:05,200 --> 00:09:08,100
who couldn't really fly at all.

218
00:09:08,100 --> 00:09:09,600
Whoa!

219
00:09:09,933 --> 00:09:11,966
MRS. BARNES:
Next he helped
Heinrich the Clown,

220
00:09:11,966 --> 00:09:16,700
whose heart had been broken
when the bearded lady left him.

221
00:09:16,700 --> 00:09:18,400
(sobbing)

222
00:09:18,400 --> 00:09:21,000
Why, why, why?

223
00:09:22,966 --> 00:09:25,933
MRS. BARNES:
Then he apprenticed with
Lionel the Lion Tamer,

224
00:09:25,933 --> 00:09:32,833
who didn't tame actual lions,
but did have a very large cat.

225
00:09:34,000 --> 00:09:35,700
(meowing)

226
00:09:37,633 --> 00:09:39,566
The circus was a complete bust.

227
00:09:39,566 --> 00:09:41,300
The people stopped
coming to see

228
00:09:41,300 --> 00:09:43,266
The Traveling Malenky Brothers.

229
00:09:43,266 --> 00:09:45,400
Sometimes,
when Shelley got thinking

230
00:09:45,400 --> 00:09:47,600
about how sad his life was,

231
00:09:47,600 --> 00:09:50,066
he would go on long
moonlit rambles.

232
00:09:50,066 --> 00:09:51,866
And it was during
one of these walks

233
00:09:51,866 --> 00:09:55,300
that he discovered
his special talent.

234
00:09:55,300 --> 00:09:56,800
Move, rock.

235
00:09:56,800 --> 00:09:58,333
I said, "Move!"
summary: آرثر هو مسلسل رسوم متحركة عن فتى صغير يدعى آرثر وأصدقائه، يعيشون مغامرات يومية ويتعلمون دروسًا حياتية مهمة عن الصداقة والعائلة والمدرسة.
tag_reason: السرعة متوسطة، جمل واضحة، محتوى يومي سهل الفهم مع بعض المفردات الجديدة

title: Adventure Time (Finn & Jake)
summary: مغامرات الفتى فين والكلب جيك هو مسلسل خيالي عن مغامراتهما الغريبة في أرض أوو السحرية، حيث يواجهان مخلوقات غريبة ويتغلبان على التحديات بروح المرح والإبداع.
tag_reason: حوار سريع، تعبيرات اصطلاحية، مواقف معقدة، مناسب لمن لديه خبرة سابقة

srt_content:
1

panda: ah it's not fair we still don't have a

2

home now we can even eat your bread in

3

4

they probably have homes probably full

5

of bread kids
some women: kids !lunch time come back to the home

6

7

hmm

8
00:00:22,699 --> 00:00:26,220
well maybe we can't buy a house but we

9
00:00:26,220 --> 00:00:28,820
can still build one

10
00:00:28,820 --> 00:00:31,980
panda: who wants to live in a sand castle 
grizzly: this

11
00:00:31,980 --> 00:00:34,500
won't be just any sand castle Panda this

12
00:00:34,500 --> 00:00:38,660
will be the sand castle of Kings

13
00:00:38,820 --> 00:00:43,160

14
00:00:46,470 --> 00:00:56,590
[Music]
summary: الدببة الثلاثة هو مسلسل كلاسيكي يعيد سرد قصة الدببة الثلاثة والفتاة الذهبية الشعر، مع مغامرات جديدة تعلّم الأطفال عن الاحترام والذكاء في التعامل مع الآخرين.

srt_content:
1

5

11

12

13

14

15

18

yay Caillou wanted to make some special

19
00:00:50,760 --> 00:00:53,559

20

lots of glitter to his cards
summary: كايلو هو مسلسل كندي عن طفل صغير يدعى كايلو يكتشف العالم من حوله مع عائلته، يعرض مواقف يومية بسيطة تساعد الأطفال على فهم الحياة والتعلم منها.

title: Daniel
summary: دانييل هو مسلسل تعليمي عن نمور صغير يدعى دانييل يتعلم كيفية التعامل مع المشاعر والتحديات اليومية بمساعدة عائلته وأصدقائه في الحي.

title: The Regular Show (The Movie)
srt_content: 1 00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:02,000 trascribed by "EngliahConvs" 2 00:00:02,000 --> 00:00:04,332 [ sighs ] 3 00:00:04,402 --> 00:00:08,065 "From the Admittance Office of College University." 4 00:00:08,140 --> 00:00:10,631 "Dear, Rigby, we regret to inform you 5 00:00:10,709 --> 00:00:13,940 that you have not been accepted into this fall's freshman class 6 00:00:14,012 --> 00:00:16,242 at College University." 7 00:00:17,816 --> 00:00:19,545 Keep reading! 8 00:00:19,618 --> 00:00:22,212 "Though College University is a massive school 9 00:00:22,287 --> 00:00:26,087 and it was a record year for how little applications we received, 10 00:00:26,158 --> 00:00:30,219 the admissions committee simply could not find any reason 11 00:00:30,295 --> 00:00:32,855 to include you in our enrolling class. 12 00:00:32,931 --> 00:00:35,729 The Deans were obliged to select among candidates 13 00:00:35,801 --> 00:00:39,965 who clearly could do the minimum work required at C. U. 14 00:00:40,038 --> 00:00:42,632 We hope you can understand our situation, 15 00:00:42,707 --> 00:00:45,005 if you can understand this letter at all. 16 00:00:45,076 --> 00:00:48,307 But rest assured that we did not make this unanimous decision 17 00:00:48,380 --> 00:00:50,143 on a whim, and as a result, 18 00:00:50,215 --> 00:00:54,117 we are not able to consider any appeals to this decision, 19 00:00:54,186 --> 00:00:56,017 so don't even try. 20 00:00:56,087 --> 00:00:59,420 Though our school motto is 'The College for Everyone', 21 00:00:59,491 --> 00:01:02,654 sometimes college isn't for everyone. 22 00:01:02,727 --> 00:01:05,195 We thank you for your interest in C. U., 23 00:01:05,263 --> 00:01:07,993 but, again, to reiterate, 24 00:01:08,066 --> 00:01:13,629 we won't be seeing you anytime soon -- or ever. 25 00:01:13,705 --> 00:01:17,505 Sincerely, the Admissions Board at College University.
summary: ذا ريجولار شو هو فيلم مغامرات كوميدي عن موظفين في حديقة عامة يواجهون أحداثًا غريبة وخارقة للطبيعة، مليء بالفكاهة والإثارة التي تناسب الكبار والصغار.

title: The Amazing World of Gumball
srt_content:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:02,280
provided by @EnglishConvs
Now we better hope we don't break down.

2
00:00:09,780 --> 00:00:14,480
Who's boring now? You really nailed it
with the fake breakdown.

3
00:00:14,760 --> 00:00:18,740
I wish I was still wearing diapers. Okay,
let's get back on the road.

4
00:00:24,540 --> 00:00:29,480
So, you're going to laugh at this. Oh,
calm down.

5
00:00:29,480 --> 00:00:33,340
Well, it's just like in the story. Some
toothless old guys can eat my brain.

6
00:00:33,540 --> 00:00:37,920
gumball, please calm down. I'm sure it's
nothing. Richard,

7
00:00:38,120 --> 00:00:41,180
why is the engine compartment full of
marshmallows? Nicole,

8
00:00:41,520 --> 00:00:42,960
I think you mean the front trunk.

9
00:00:46,819 --> 00:00:50,100
Okay, this is not going to ruin our family
outing. Here,

10
00:00:50,300 --> 00:00:52,860
there's a garage a mile north. Richard, go
get help.

11
00:00:53,000 --> 00:00:56,720
Okay, I'll go when my marshmallow's done. All right.

12
00:00:56,880 --> 00:00:57,540
Thank you, honey.
summary: العالم المدهش لغمبول هو مسلسل عن قط مراهق يدعى غمبول وعائلته الغريبة في مدينة إلتون، حيث تحدث مواقف مضحكة وغير متوقعة تنتقد الحياة اليومية بطريقة فكاهية.
tag_reason: حوار سريع، تعبيرات اصطلاحية، مواقف معقدة، مناسب لمن لديه خبرة سابقة

title: Looney Tunes
srt_content: 1 00:00:00 --> 00:00:03,120 Prepared with care by English Convs 2 00:00:03,120 --> 00:00:06,750 Not great, weird combination, 3 00:00:06,760 --> 00:00:11,470 don't move - why spider 4 00:00:11,480 --> 00:00:15,510 where, where is it, is it on me, get it off me, 5 00:00:15,520 --> 00:00:20,030 get out of the way , where did it go - what did it look like, 6 00:00:20,040 --> 00:00:21,670 it was the biggest spider i've ever 7 00:00:21,680 --> 00:00:28,590 seen, 8 00:00:28,600 --> 00:00:32,509 what are you doing - i going to kill it are you mad? 9 00:00:32,520 --> 00:00:39,030 you can't do that, you need to capture it and take it outside, and then kill it. 10 00:00:39,040 --> 00:00:45,110 we don't want that mess in here, the maid just cleaned. - we don't have a maid. i meant you. 11 00:00:45,120 --> 00:00:49,470 hey guys, spider - lola.
summary: لوني تونز هي سلسلة رسوم متحركة كلاسيكية تضم شخصيات شهيرة مثل باغز باني ودافي داك وتويطي، تعرض نكات وسيناريوهات كوميدية خالدة تناسب جميع الأعمار.

title: Strange World
srt_content:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:02,000
📢 تابعنا على قناة English Convs لتعلم الإنجليزية!

2
00:00:01,879 --> 00:00:03,318
المتحدث 0: Do you see that everyone?

3
00:00:04,037 --> 00:00:09,634
المتحدث 0: They'll be telling our story for generations to come? Or what lies beyond that horizon? Is that

4
00:00:10,833 --> 00:00:13,311
المتحدث 0: Future and our gore. Hey, Dad.

5
00:00:13,951 --> 00:00:17,635
المتحدث 1: What about these plans? There's literally power surging through that.

6
00:00:19,707 --> 00:00:28,073
المتحدث 0: Well, search. I do love your in inclusion spirit, but... Our crew didn't come all this way just to get distracted by some sparkly plants.

7
00:00:28,950 --> 00:00:40,958
المتحدث 1: Yes, dad, but our crew did come out here to make a discovery that could change Ava ammonia. Right? The discovery, our crew is looking for is on the other side of these bounds

8
00:00:41,336 --> 00:00:43,113
المتحدث 0: because that's Evo

9
00:00:43,492 --> 00:00:48,215
المتحدث 1: future. But if our crew would just take a look at these plants they could see that

10
00:00:49,252 --> 00:00:56,216
المتحدث 0: Future might be right here. Fuck this crew has been training since they were a baby to do one thing. Cart.

11
00:00:56,594 --> 00:00:59,887
المتحدث 0: Nope. And that one thing is to walk would be beyond

12
00:01:00,199 --> 00:01:11,361
المتحدث 0: that horizon. But did you ever bothered to even ask the crew if that's what they really wanted? Oh, they're not really talking about the crew are they. Search. We're explorers. Not gardeners.

13
00:01:11,934 --> 00:01:16,165
المتحدث 0: Conquering those mountains is our legacy. No, dad. It's yours.

14
00:01:16,804 --> 00:01:17,043
المتحدث 0: Enough.

15
00:01:17,682 --> 00:01:19,837
المتحدث 0: You're my son. But I'm not you.
summary: عالم غريب هو فيلم مغامرات عن عائلة من المستكشفين تكتشف عالماً سرياً غامضاً تحت أرضهم، حيث تواجه مخلوقات غريبة وتتعلم أهمية العمل الجماعي وحماية البيئة.
tag_reason: حوار سريع، تعبيرات اصطلاحية، مواقف معقدة، مناسب لمن لديه خبرة سابقة

title: Arthur (2)
srt_content:
1
00:00:01,419 --> 00:00:05,000
💡 English Convs - تعلّم الإنجليزية بطريقة ممتعة وتدريجية!
تابعنا على تليغرام 📲 @EnglishConvs

2
00:00:05,419 --> 00:00:07,952
Arthur, look what
I got from Grandma.

3
00:00:07,952 --> 00:00:08,485
(sighs)

4
00:00:08,485 --> 00:00:10,285
Please tell me
you've already named it.

5
00:00:10,285 --> 00:00:12,419
Of course I haven't named it.

6
00:00:12,419 --> 00:00:15,285
Come on, we have
to get started.

7
00:00:15,552 --> 00:00:19,019
Whenever D.W. gets a new
stuffed animal or doll,

8
00:00:19,019 --> 00:00:20,252
I have to help her name it.

9
00:00:20,252 --> 00:00:24,152
And it's a very elaborate
process.

10
00:00:25,419 --> 00:00:30,385
First, D.W. has to be
blindfolded and spun around.

11
00:00:31,485 --> 00:00:32,319
Stop!

12
00:00:32,319 --> 00:00:34,219
All right,
remove the blindfold.

13
00:00:34,219 --> 00:00:38,419
Then, the first letter of
the first thing she sees

14
00:00:38,419 --> 00:00:41,485
will be the first letter
of the doll's name.

15
00:00:42,952 --> 00:00:44,285
Xylophone.

16
00:00:44,285 --> 00:00:45,519
X-- great.

17
00:00:45,519 --> 00:00:48,585
Only the toughest letter
of the alphabet.

18
00:00:48,585 --> 00:00:49,752
A challenge!

19
00:00:49,752 --> 00:00:52,485
Okay, let's make
the naming potion.
summary: آرثر (الجزء الثاني) يستمر في عرض مغامرات آرثر النمساء وأصدقائه في المدرسة والحي، مع دروس جديدة عن النمو الشخصي والتعامل مع تحديات الطفولة.
tag_reason: السرعة متوسطة، جمل واضحة، محتوى يومي سهل الفهم مع بعض المفردات الجديدة

title: Monster Inc
srt_content:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:03,520
تابع @EnglishConvs قناتنا على تليغرام لمزيد من المقاطع المختارة 📢
Hey look, I think I have a plan here.
Using mainly spoons,

2
00:00:04,120 --> 00:00:07,020
we dig a tunnel under the city and release
it into the wild.

3
00:00:08,180 --> 00:00:13,040
Spoons. That's it. I'm out of ideas. We're
closed. Hot air balloon,

4
00:00:13,160 --> 00:00:16,160
too expensive. Giant slingshot, too
conspicuous. Enormous wooden horse,

5
00:00:16,340 --> 00:00:20,940
too Greek. I can't look at this, oh Peter.
No plan,

6
00:00:21,120 --> 00:00:25,980
no plan. Can't think. Can't think.
Flatliner. Flatliner.

7
00:00:26,020 --> 00:00:30,860
Oh Mike, I think she's getting tired.
Well, then why

8
00:00:30,860 --> 00:00:34,760
don't you find some place for you to
sleep? While I think of a plan!

9
00:00:37,240 --> 00:00:41,380
Are you sleepy? You wanna sleep? Is that
what you want?

10
00:00:41,740 --> 00:00:42,180
Huh?
summary: شركة المرعبين المحدودة هو فيلم عن عالم الوحوش الذين يعتمدون على صراخ الأطفال للطاقة، لكن كل شيء يتغير عندما يدخل طفلة بشرية إلى عالمهم وتغير نظرتهم للأطفال.
tag_reason: حوار سريع، تعبيرات اصطلاحية، مواقف معقدة، مناسب لمن لديه خبرة سابقة

title: Luck 2022
srt_content:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:02,000
📢 تابعنا على قناة English Convs لتعلم الإنجليزية!

2
00:00:08,520 --> 00:00:09,420
المتحدث 0: And now

3
00:00:09,880 --> 00:00:11,160
المتحدث 0: it's a table for two.

4
00:00:16,594 --> 00:00:18,584
المتحدث 0: Why couldn't it have just worked out.

5
00:00:22,168 --> 00:00:22,327
المتحدث 0: Oh,

6
00:00:23,043 --> 00:00:24,397
المتحدث 0: sorry. I didn't tell you the first part.

7
00:00:25,512 --> 00:00:26,706
المتحدث 0: My friend Hazel.

8
00:00:27,199 --> 00:00:29,991
المتحدث 0: Could have been one step closer to getting adopted today,

9
00:00:30,709 --> 00:00:31,666
المتحدث 0: but it didn't happen.

10
00:00:32,304 --> 00:00:33,820
المتحدث 0: Her weekend visit got canceled,

11
00:00:35,415 --> 00:00:40,222
المتحدث 0: which probably doesn't sound like a big deal, but believe me it is

12
00:00:41,494 --> 00:00:47,250
المتحدث 0: You only get so many chances to find a forever family and the old you get, the harder it is.

13
00:00:48,769 --> 00:00:50,528
المتحدث 0: She's meeting a new couple on Sunday.

14
00:00:51,007 --> 00:00:53,566
المتحدث 0: If I could just give her a little good luck.

15
00:00:54,859 --> 00:00:57,569
المتحدث 0: But you can't give someone something you've never had.

16
00:00:59,403 --> 00:00:59,642
المتحدث 0: Still,

17
00:01:00,280 --> 00:01:00,998
المتحدث 0: if I could.

18
00:01:01,875 --> 00:01:06,738
المتحدث 0: And if good luck was something you could actually hold in your hand. I give it all to hazel.

19
00:01:07,376 --> 00:01:12,356
المتحدث 0: So that maybe she could find you forever family and not ends up alone like me

20
00:01:13,051 --> 00:01:13,849
المتحدث 0: sitting on a curb.

21
00:01:15,284 --> 00:01:16,161
المتحدث 0: Talking to a cat.

22
00:01:18,234 --> 00:01:18,553
المتحدث 0: Oh,

23
00:01:21,901 --> 00:01:22,619
المتحدث 0: You're welcome.
summary: لاك 2022 هو فيلم عن عالم سحري حيث تتحكم كائنات في حظ البشر، وتدور القصة حول شابة تحاول تغيير حظها السيء وتكتشف أسرار هذا العالم الغامض.
tag_reason: حوار سريع، تعبيرات اصطلاحية، مواقف معقدة، مناسب لمن لديه خبرة سابقة
